name: Angeles Bashir
text: Holy cow, this is a great place. It makes you feel like you are at an old time steak house -- a jazz band in the corner, perfectly mixed drinks, impeccable service, and top class food. Great for people watching too!

name: Anthony Soto
text: I came in and placed my order at 8:07 and was greeted with a nice employee with a big smile but was told my cinnamon sticks would take only 12 minutes I didn't get it till 8:37. I felt I was there waiting a little longer than I should and is something i feel must be improved on.

name: Eli Johnson
text: Bro open late, and affordable. 90% of the time you get a great pizza. They know what’s up.

name: Stephanie Redlich
text: My kid loves cheese pizza. Their delivery team always have a smile and are pretty quick even on busy days. Never a problem with food quality. Sign up online and get points towards free food. We get a free medium pizza every 2-3 orders.

name: Roamer1
text:
3/5/18 between 7-9pm

text: My first time at this location and I must stay it’s my favorite food is delicious customer service with even better thank you guys

name: Matthew Cameron
text: I see the same female working the counter every time. Seems like she is always alone in there. Good food and good service from her. Do not wear a name tag so I do not know her name. Must be the Manager.

text: 2 hours out on delivery!!! Sounds like you need more delivery drivers!!! Then we finally got the pizza and must of been made when we called it in, cold and hard.

text: The guy who took my order was nice. When I came in nobody was there to take my order and it took a few minutes to get service.

name: Terri Lape
text: Terrible Pizza! Filthy Carpet. They brought our pizza to the table in a to-go box for dine in. Absolutely zero customer service. So disapointed in Pizza Hut we won't be back.

name: Big Boss
text: Very clean place, Thin crust pizza made to my liking and super tasty and fresh and hot. My boneless wing 8 pc., was good too. Enough Hawaiian teriyaki sauce to cover all wings. Tastes great. I had Carry Out, went back to the Holiday Inn Express to share the goodness !!

name: Joshua Birt

name: R. S.
text: In town for a few days and called in our order, female was very rude and snotty. Picked up our order and still she took more than 5 mins to help us. Pizza was sloppy as well.

name: Karen Osborne
text: Staff acted like they wished we had gone somewhere else. Maybe that's why in the middle of the lunch hour, we were the only customers.  The only thing that saved the experience was that the pizza was good.

text:
Ordered 3 pizzas and a p zone. Very few toppings on any of them, but the specialty Supreme was the worst!
Come on Pizza Hut, there are 30 different places we can and WILL go!!

All around very good

Some locations hit or miss

name: AJ Travis
text: This place is horrible. They bring you a menu to look at but then never come back to take a order from. They completely ignored my family when we stood and waited to be seated. Waited 45 mins for our food and then it was cold and wrong toppings on the pizza. Would not recommend this place to anyone.

name: Julie Baker
text: Anthony is the BEST!  I can not thank him enough for saving all my hungry employees after the sub place dropped the ball and left us with nothing. He went above and beyond to get me 28 large Pizza's and wings in 30 min! Outstanding!

name: Dorothy Parcel
text: Worst pizza hut . I took my grandchildren here a few months ago but remember like it was last night. I have only ate at pizza hut. No other place could beat it. Until that night. No ice for the drinks, bathroom nasty, and let's not forget the bug on the table. I called the phone number on the ticket, no response. I have not been back
